attributes.additional_details: My taxes contribute towards wars fought in the name of democracy and yet often our workplaces resemble tyrannies.  Support democracy in the workplace (eg. WorldBlu.com).  I would like the government to promote and/or raise awareness of this issue.  Democracy would include greater accountability and transparency, open book management, more freedom, more consensus, less rule by fear, more common sense, more joy, and where you aren't penalized for taking your heart to work.
